title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Engineering Manager Leadership Development with Socio-Emotional Career Readiness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering knowledge and management experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Within four weeks, learners can identify at least three personal strengths/weaknesses using a socio-emotional competency self-assessment tool and develop an improvement plan.
Learners can perform conflict management and communication tasks with over 80% success rate through team-based role-play simulations.
By analyzing job transition case studies, learners can create and implement a personalized career development roadmap by the end of the course.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
